languages.text: "Ваш приказ имеет большой вес, но мое назначение не будет таким быстрым. Еще не было случая, чтобы маршала избирали в Коронусе, да еще и без участия Лорд-маршала — нам придется составить новый регламент, иначе мы, Арбитес, не сможем принять изменения. Но до назначения я буду руководить арбитрами как формальный глава".

"Your decree carries great weight, but my assignment will not happen so quickly. There is no precedent for electing a new Marshal in the Expanse, not to mention that the Lord Marshal is unable to participate in the process — we will have to develop a new procedure. Otherwise, we Arbitrators will not accept these changes. Until my official assignment, though, I will lead as acting head of the Adeptus Arbites."
languages.original_text: "Ваш приказ имеет большой вес, но мое назначение не будет таким быстрым. Еще не было случая, чтобы маршала избирали в Коронусе, да еще и без участия Лорд-маршала — нам придется составить новый регламент, иначе мы, Арбитес, не сможем принять изменения. Но до назначения я буду руководить арбитрами как формальный глава".

There is no precedent for electing a new Marshal in the Expanse, not to mention that the Lord Marshal is unable to participate — we will have to develop a new procedure, otherwise us Arbitrators will not accept these changes. Until my official assignment, though, I will lead as acting head of the Adeptus Arbites."

languages.text: "Euer Dekret hat großes Gewicht, aber so schnell werde ich nicht eingesetzt. Es ist in der Ausdehnung noch nie vorgekommen, dass ein neuer Marschall bestimmt wurde und der amtierende Lord Marschall nicht an der Wahl beteiligt war. Wir müssen ein völlig neues Prozedere entwickeln. Andernfalls werden wir Arbitratoren diese Veränderungen nicht akzeptieren. Bis zu meiner offiziellen Ernennung werde ich das Adeptus Arbites allerdings kommissarisch leiten."
languages.original_text: "Your decree carries great weight, but my assignment will not happen so quickly. There is no precedent for electing a new Marshal in the Expanse, not to mention that the Lord Marshal is unable to participate in the process — we will have to develop a new procedure. Otherwise, we Arbitrators will not accept these changes. Until my official assignment, though, I will lead as acting head of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Dekret hat großes Gewicht, aber so schnell werde ich nicht eingesetzt. Es ist in der Ausdehnung noch nie vorgekommen, dass ein neuer Marschall bestimmt wurde und der amtierende Lord Marschall nicht an der Wahl beteiligt war. Wir müssen ein völlig neues Prozedere entwickeln. Andernfalls werden wir Arbitratoren diese Veränderungen nicht akzeptieren. Bis zu meiner offiziellen Ernennung werde ich das Adeptus Arbites allerdings kommissarisch leiten."

languages.text: « Votre décret a beaucoup de poids, mais ma nomination n'aura pas lieu de sitôt. L'élection d'un nouveau maréchal est un événement sans précédent dans les Étendues, et comme le seigneur maréchal ne pourra pas prendre part à la procédure, nous devrons en mettre au point une nouvelle. Autrement, les arbitrators n'accepteront pas ce changement. Cela dit, j'assurerai l'intérim en attendant mon affectation officielle. »
languages.original_text: "Your decree carries great weight, but my assignment will not happen so quickly. There is no precedent for electing a new Marshal in the Expanse, not to mention that the Lord Marshal is unable to participate in the process — we will have to develop a new procedure. Otherwise, we Arbitrators will not accept these changes. Until my official assignment, though, I will lead as acting head of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: « Votre décret a beaucoup de poids, mais ma nomination n'aura pas lieu de sitôt. L'élection d'un nouveau maréchal est un événement sans précédent dans les Étendues, et comme le seigneur maréchal ne pourra pas prendre part à la procédure, nous devrons en mettre au point une nouvelle. Autrement, les arbitrators n'accepteront pas ce changement. Cela dit, j'assurerai l'intérim en attendant mon affectation officielle. »

languages.text: “你的法令非常重要，但我恐怕没办法那么快就上任。科罗努斯扩区尚无选举新任元帅的先例，更不用提如今元帅本人无法参与选举过程。我们必须想办法制定新的程序，否则我们这些法务官恐怕无法接受这样的人事变更。不过，正式上任之前，我会作为法务部的代理元帅履行职责。”
languages.original_text: "Your decree carries great weight, but my assignment will not happen so quickly. There is no precedent for electing a new Marshal in the Expanse, not to mention that the Lord Marshal is unable to participate in the process — we will have to develop a new procedure. Otherwise, we Arbitrators will not accept these changes. Until my official assignment, though, I will lead as acting head of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: “你的法令非常重要，但我恐怕没办法那么快就上任。科罗努斯扩区尚无选举新任元帅的先例，更不用提如今元帅本人无法参与选举过程。我们必须想办法制定新的程序，否则我们这些法务官恐怕无法接受这样的人事变更。不过，正式上任之前，我会作为法务部的代理元帅履行职责。”

languages.text: «Su decreto acarrea un gran peso, pero mi nombramiento no será inmediato. No hay precedentes para la elección de un nuevo Mariscal en la Extensión, y el lord Mariscal no puede participar en el proceso, por lo que necesitaremos un nuevo procedimiento para que los Arbitrator podamos aceptar los cambios. Por eso, hasta mi nombramiento oficial, ejerceré de líder temporal del Adeptus Arbites».
languages.original_text: "Your decree carries great weight, but my assignment will not happen so quickly. There is no precedent for electing a new Marshal in the Expanse, not to mention that the Lord Marshal is unable to participate in the process — we will have to develop a new procedure. Otherwise, we Arbitrators will not accept these changes. Until my official assignment, though, I will lead as acting head of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: «Su decreto acarrea un gran peso, pero mi nombramiento no será inmediato. No hay precedentes para la elección de un nuevo Mariscal en la Extensión, y el lord Mariscal no puede participar en el proceso, por lo que necesitaremos un nuevo procedimiento para que los Arbitrator podamos aceptar los cambios. Por eso, hasta mi nombramiento oficial, ejerceré de líder temporal del Adeptus Arbites».

languages.text: 「あなたのご命令には大きな重みがありますが、私の任命はすぐには実現しません。エクスパンスにおいて新たな将帥を選出する前例はなく、しかも現行の手続きでは将帥自身が選出プロセスに関与できない状況です。したがって、新たな選任手続きを策定しなければなりません。そうでなければ、私たちアービトレイターはこの変更を受け入れないでしょう。しかし、正式な任命が下るまでは、私が高等裁定局の暫定指揮官としてその任にあたります」
languages.original_text: "Your decree carries great weight, but my assignment will not happen so quickly. There is no precedent for electing a new Marshal in the Expanse, not to mention that the Lord Marshal is unable to participate in the process — we will have to develop a new procedure. Otherwise, we Arbitrators will not accept these changes. Until my official assignment, though, I will lead as acting head of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのご命令には大きな重みがありますが、私の任命はすぐには実現しません。エクスパンスにおいて新たな将帥を選出する前例はなく、しかも現行の手続きでは将帥自身が選出プロセスに関与できない状況です。したがって、新たな選任手続きを策定しなければなりません。そうでなければ、私たちアービトレイターはこの変更を受け入れないでしょう。しかし、正式な任命が下るまでは、私が高等裁定局の暫定指揮官としてその任にあたります」

languages.text: "Hükmünüzün ağırlığını anlatmaya kelimeler yetmez ancak bu denli çabuk atanmam mümkün değil. Enginlik'te yeni bir Miralay seçiminin emsali görülmemiştir. Ferik'in sürece katılamayacağı da cabası. Yeni bir usul bulmamız gerekecek. Aksi takdirde biz Yargıcılar, bu değişimi kabul etmeyiz. Resmî atamam gerçekleşene kadar vekaleten Adeptus Arbites'in başı olarak görevimi sürdüreceğim."
languages.original_text: "Your decree carries great weight, but my assignment will not happen so quickly. There is no precedent for electing a new Marshal in the Expanse, not to mention that the Lord Marshal is unable to participate in the process — we will have to develop a new procedure. Otherwise, we Arbitrators will not accept these changes. Until my official assignment, though, I will lead as acting head of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Hükmünüzün ağırlığını anlatmaya kelimeler yetmez ancak bu denli çabuk atanmam mümkün değil. Enginlik'te yeni bir Miralay seçiminin emsali görülmemiştir. Ferik'in sürece katılamayacağı da cabası. Yeni bir usul bulmamız gerekecek. Aksi takdirde biz Yargıcılar bu değişimi kabul etmeyiz. Ancak resmî atamam gerçekleşene kadar Adeptus Arbites'in vekil önderi olarak görevimi sürdüreceğim."
